text:
Whoever responded to the survey and under “what can we do to make the experience for those watching the stream engaging and enjoyable” and responded with _*“use a 3D camera so we can move the view around.“*_

Super stinking cool idea, I’ll be honest though we probably won’t be able to do that for this event, maybe for future events. If anyone in the community owns a 3D camera or 360 camera, and would be willing to borrow it out for livestreaming, ping <@U26BLKGE4> and I.

We may not have the equipment/cables needed to make that work but we can atleast see if that’s feasible or worth it.

Otherwise your other 2 suggestions - we’re already planning on doing that :slightly_smiling_face: Great minds think alike

*Hey Everyone!*, just want to take this moment to let you know that RSVP's for the Developer Community Meetup are officially Live! Please feel free to visit: <https://devday.splashthat.com/> and sign up to the event! As a reminder, space is limited so make sure to RSVP as soon as you can and we look forward to seeing you at the event (and online, as we will be streaming it :wink: )
